author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Announcement Trailer for Aether & Iron, a narrative choice-based tactical RPG developed by Seismic Squirrel. Players will enter an alternative 1930s New York City where anti-gravity technology takes hold of the cars, roads, and the city itself. Make dialogue choices to assemble a crew, engage with turn-based combat, and reveal the dark secrets behind the city in the clouds. Aether & Iron is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#AetherAndIron #Gaming #IGN
title: Aether & Iron - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In an eerie, deceptively placid near-future, a techno-entrepreneur named Karsh (Cassel) has developed a new software that will allow the bereaved to bear witness to the gradual decay of loved ones dead and buried in the earth. While Karsh is still reeling from the loss of his wife (Kruger) from cancer—and falling into a peculiar sexual relationship with his wife’s sister (also Kruger)—a spate of vandalized graves utilizing his “shroud” technology begins to put his enterprise at risk, leading him to uncover a potentially vast conspiracy.

#TheShrouds #IGN #Movies
title: The Shrouds - Official Trailer (2025) Vincent Cassel, Diane Kruger, Guy Pearce

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Launch Trailer for DC: Dark Legion, a free-to-play action strategy game developed by FunPlus. Players will experience an original story being recruited by the universe’s last Monitor to help defend Earth Prime from The Batman Who Laughs and his horrific army of Dark Knights. Engage in strategic PvE and PvP combat with customizable parties, exploiting powerful synergies between fan-favorite Super Heroes and Super-Villains. DC: Dark Legion is available now for iOS, Android, and PC.

#DCDarkLegion #Gaming #IGN
title: DC: Dark Legion - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Hunt: Mega Edition is coming to Roblox. Check out the Roblox - The Hunt: Mega Edition trailer where you can play through 25 experiences, complete quests, and rack up tokens to unlock exclusive UGC. The top 10 players will head to Roblox HQ for a live showdown—with $1M on the line. Ready to make history?

#Roblox #Gaming #IGN
title: Roblox - Official The Hunt: Mega Edition Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's your first look at Forefront in this reveal trailer for the upcoming multiplayer shooter game from the creators of Hyper Dash and Breachers. Forefront will be available on Meta Quest 2, 3, 3s & Pro, Pico, and PC VR in fall 2025. 

Forefront is an intense VR shooter featuring 32-player large-scale battles, land, sea, and air vehicles, and immersive, tactical combat. You are the tip of the spear in the war between a global energy giant and resistance forces. Which side will you take?

#Forefront #Gaming #IGN
title: Forefront - Official Reveal Trailer | VR Games Showcase March 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at approaching a mission in three different ways in this extended gameplay video of Forest Reigns, the upcoming narrative-driven first-person shooter set in a post-apocalyptic Paris where the resulting intelligent forest can be utilized as a friend or be turned into an enemy. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3325070/Forest_Reigns/

#ForestReigns #Gaming #IGN
title: Forest Reigns: Official Deep-Dive Gameplay Trailer

description:

author: IGN
description:
Enjoy a catchy tune and check out gameplay in this latest Billie Bust Up trailer for the upcoming 3D platforming musical game inspired by your favorite timeless, magical animated films. The new trailer reveals the song "I've Had Enough of You." In Billie Bust Up, meet a fantastical cast of characters, take gameplay cues from the music—and try not to let the villains’ songs get stuck in your head. Bille Bust Up will be available on PC.

#BillieBustUp #Gaming #IGN
title: Billie Bust Up - Humble Games Showcase 2025 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Fire the First Dreamer cinematic trailer for the upcoming open-world survival RPG. Fire the First Dreamer will be available on PC.

Embark on a boundless open-world adventure across the sprawling expanse of over 40 square miles nestled within the majestic Preseli mountains in Wales. Decode enigmatic messages etched in an ancient language, unveiling secrets as old as time itself. Harness the primal magic of totem animals, summoning their power to aid in your quest for survival amidst the untamed wilderness. Traverse a landscape steeped in the echoes of our forebears, each corner brimming with the whispers of forgotten tales.

#FireTheFirstDreamer #Gaming #IGN
title: Fire the First Dreamer - Official Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
FATE: Reawakened, a full remaster of the original classic FATE series, is available now on PC, PS4 (PlayStation 4), PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch. Watch the FATE: Reawakened launch trailer to see gameplay and more from this remaster which updates the dungeon crawler quadrilogy with complete graphical overhauls and additional language support. FATE: Reawakened comprises all four original games, including the sequels FATE: Undiscovered Realms, FATE: The Traitor Soul, and FATE: The Cursed King.

#FateReawakened #Gaming #IGN
title: Fate: Reawakened - Official Launch Trailer
